java/liquibase/servlet/LiquibaseStatusServlet.java

00001 package liquibase.servlet;
00002 
00003 import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
00004 import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
00005 import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
00006 import javax.servlet.ServletException;
00007 import java.util.logging.LogRecord;
00008 import java.util.logging.Level;
00009 import java.util.List;
00010 import java.util.ArrayList;
00011 import java.util.Date;
00012 import java.io.IOException;
00013 import java.io.PrintWriter;
00014 import java.text.DateFormat;
00015 
00019 public class LiquibaseStatusServlet extends HttpServlet {
00020 
00021     private static List<LogRecord> liquibaseRunLog = new ArrayList<LogRecord>();
00022 
00023     public static synchronized void logMessage(LogRecord message) {
00024         liquibaseRunLog.add(message);
00025 
00026     }
00027 
00028     protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse httpServletResponse) throws ServletException, IOException {
00029         httpServletResponse.setContentType("text/html");
00030 
00031         String logLevelToDisplay = httpServletRequest.getParameter("logLevel");
00032         Level currentLevel = Level.INFO;
00033         if (logLevelToDisplay != null) {
00034             currentLevel = Level.parse(logLevelToDisplay);
00035         }
00036 
00037         PrintWriter writer = httpServletResponse.getWriter();
00038         writer.println("<html>");
00039         writer.println("<head><title>LiquiBase Status</title></head>");
00040         writer.println("<body>");
00041         if (liquibaseRunLog.size() == 0) {
00042             writer.println("<b>LiquiBase did not run</b>");
00043         } else {
00044             writer.println("<b>View level: " + getLevelLink(Level.SEVERE, currentLevel, httpServletRequest)
00045                     + " " + getLevelLink(Level.WARNING, currentLevel, httpServletRequest)
00046                     + " " + getLevelLink(Level.INFO, currentLevel, httpServletRequest)
00047                     + " " + getLevelLink(Level.CONFIG, currentLevel, httpServletRequest)
00048                     + " " + getLevelLink(Level.FINE, currentLevel, httpServletRequest)
00049                     + " " + getLevelLink(Level.FINER, currentLevel, httpServletRequest)
00050                     + " " + getLevelLink(Level.FINEST, currentLevel, httpServletRequest)
00051                     + "</b>");
00052 
00053             writer.println("<hr>");
00054             writer.println("<b>LiquiBase started at " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance().format(new Date(liquibaseRunLog.get(0).getMillis())));
00055             writer.println("<hr>");
00056             writer.println("<pre>");
00057             for (LogRecord record : liquibaseRunLog) {
00058                 if (record.getLevel().intValue() >= currentLevel.intValue()) {
00059                     writer.println(record.getLevel() + ": " + record.getMessage());
00060                     if (record.getThrown() != null) {
00061                         record.getThrown().printStackTrace(writer);
00062                     }
00063                 }
00064             }
00065             writer.println("");
00066             writer.println("");
00067 
00068             writer.println("</pre>");
00069             writer.println("<hr>");
00070             writer.println("<b>LiquiBase finished at " + DateFormat.getDateTimeInstance().format(new Date(liquibaseRunLog.get(liquibaseRunLog.size() - 1).getMillis())));
00071         }
00072         writer.println("</body>");
00073         writer.println("</html>");
00074     }
00075 
00076     private String getLevelLink(Level level, Level currentLevel, HttpServletRequest request) {
00077         if (currentLevel.equals(level)) {
00078             return level.getName();
00079         } else {
00080             return "<a href=" + request.getRequestURI() + "?logLevel=" + level.getName() + ">" + level.getName() + "</a>";
00081         }
00082     }
00083 }
